price: 14. Markay Rusushu ugaga yimaadeen hortooda iyo gadaashooda5 (iyagoo ku leh): Ha caabudina cidaan ahayn Alle. Waxay yidhaahdeen: Hadduu Rabbigayo doono6, wuxuu soo diri lahaa malaa’ig. Ee innagu waxa la idinla soo diray waa ku gaalownay.
arabic: إِذۡ جَآءَتۡهُمُ ٱلرُّسُلُ مِنۢ بَيۡنِ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَمِنۡ خَلۡفِهِمۡ أَلَّا تَعۡبُدُوٓاْ إِلَّا ٱللَّهَۖ قَالُواْ لَوۡ شَآءَ رَبُّنَا لَأَنزَلَ مَلَٰٓئِكَةٗ فَإِنَّا بِمَآ أُرۡسِلۡتُم بِهِۦ كَٰفِرُونَ
footnotes:
5. Waxa loola jeedaa hortooda iyo gadaashooda waxay uga yimaadeen dhinac kasta. 
6. Inuu soo diro Rusul.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: idh jāathumu al-rusulu min bayni aydīhim wamin khalfihim allā taʿbudū illā al-laha qālū law shāa rabbunā la-anzala malāikatan fa-innā bimā ur'sil'tum bihi kāfirūna
